description: Ipmiping is a collection of two programs, impiping and rmcpping. Both ipmiping and rmcpping are similar to the Unix/Linux ping utility, except they use a different network protocol. Ipmiping uses Intelligent Platform Management Interface (IPMI) messages to discover if a remote destination supports IPMI. Rmcpping uses remote management control protocol (RMCP) messages to discover if a remote destination supports RMCP.
name: Ipmiping V1.0
